Docs.param: File picker options to use; may be null
Docs.summary: Starts file picker for selecting a single file.
Docs.returns: File picking result object, or null when picking was cancelled by the user.
Docs.remarks: File types can be specified in order to limit files that can be selected, using a PickOptions object. Note that this method may re-throw platform specific exceptions that occured during file picking. When calling PickAsync() again while showing a file picker, the Task object that was returned from the first call is cancelled. Be sure to also handle the TaskCanceledException in this case.
